headline: Will MGM (MGM) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: MGM (MGM) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: MGM Resorts (MGM) Soars 7.27% as Macau Gaming Revenues Surge
summary: MGM Resorts International (NYSE:MGM) is one of These 10 Stocks Went Bulletproof. MGM Resorts extended its winning streak to a third straight day on Tuesday, adding 7.27 percent to close at $36.89 apiece as investors cheered higher-than-expected gaming revenues in Macau. According to data released by Macau’s Gaming Inspection and Coordination Bureau, gross gaming revenues (GGR) […]

headline: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) Soars 8.89% as Macau Gaming Raises Revenue Prospects
summary: Las Vegas Sands Corp. (NYSE:LVS) is one of These 10 Stocks Went Bulletproof. Las Vegas Sands jumped by 8.89 percent on Tuesday to close at $47.38 apiece as investors scooped up shares following news that Macau’s gaming revenues in June surged by 19 percent year-on-year. On Tuesday, the Gaming Inspection and Coordination Bureau of Macau […]
